text: Jeremy Wang (born 25 November 1991), better known by the alias Disguised Toast, is a Taiwanese-Canadian streamer, YouTuber and Internet personality. He began his career on YouTube, creating videos about the digital card game Hearthstone. He was born in Taipei, Taiwan. Wang later began streaming on Twitch. As of March 2023, Wang is a member of OfflineTV, an online social entertainment group of content creators. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian YouTubers Category:Taiwanese entertainers Category:People from Kingston, Ontario Category:Twitch (service) streamers
title: Disguised Toast
